summary: This is an email exchange between FBI personnel regarding a call about an Epstein claim fund. The sender, Angela, suggests that if the call will only discuss victim services, then FBI participation may not be necessary, and they can follow up afterward.

persons.name: Angela
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email regarding a call about an Epstein claim fund, suggesting FBI participation may not be necessary if the call is only about victim services.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein claim fund call
events.description: FBI personnel discuss whether to participate in a call regarding an Epstein claim fund, with Angela suggesting they may not need to be on the call if it only concerns victim services.

keyFacts: An email exchange between FBI personnel discusses a call about an 'Epstein claim fund'.
The sender, Angela, an SSA with FBI New York, questions the necessity of FBI participation if the call is solely about victim services.
The email suggests ongoing FBI involvement or monitoring of matters related to Epstein, specifically a claim fund, as of August 2020.
